messages.content: You will be provided with an ultrasound image and comparative case materials including a historical image and report: "Right Breast Cancer Simple Excision Specimen": At the 3 o'clock position, there is localized fibrous tissue hyperplasia with inflammatory cell infiltration, foreign body giant cell reaction, and part of the ductal epithelium shows usual hyperplasia; in the lesion area, fibroadenoma formation is noted, without definitive cancer residue. Considering the history, consistent with changes post-tumor resection; a small focal atypical apocrine hyperplasia is observed in the upper outer quadrant (maximum diameter about 0.05 cm under the microscope); the remaining upper inner quadrant (-), upper outer quadrant (-), lower inner quadrant (-), lower outer quadrant (-); vasculature (-), skin (-), nipple (-). Please generate a medical report based on this information.
Ductal carcinoma in situ with comedo necrosis.
